name: Critter Run
description:
This game was created during the Playspace Game Jam that happened in January 2017.

The theme of the game jam was :Giant Worlds, so we decided to make a game that involved having a player experience the world through the eyes of something small.

After testing out a couple of concepts, we decided to make a game involving a mouse exploring a garden trying to collect cheese while avoiding elephants trying to step on him and other obstacles that are in his way.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

Shift - Sprint

Credits:
Matthew Ferreira (@KeyItems) - Programming and Design

Steven Wilson - Design

Medhat Hanbali - Sound Design and Art

Peter Vidya - Art
